item.description: Check the message board for the inspiration on this! There seems to be a lot of interest in Wednesday after work climbing, so let's give it a shot this week and see how it goes. Let's meet at 7:00 at Rock Spot. If you need to take a belay test you might want to arrive earlier so you'll be ready to climb with us. Remember to mention that you're with the meet-up group when you check in if you're not a member to get our special meet-up rate. $10 if you have you have your own gear, $15 including gear rental.
item.name: Wednesday Night Climb at Rock Spot
